item.title: B2B Saas From India
item.description:
The Ultimate B2B SaaS Playbook: How to Build a Global Company from India

The dream of building a world-class software company from India is no longer a dreamâ€”it’s a proven reality. Giants like Zoho, Freshworks, and Postman have paved a superhighway from Indian tech hubs to the boardrooms of the US and Europe.

But how do you actually do it? How do you overcome the distance, the time zones, and the initial lack of trust to win high-value customers in the West?
